title: Franklin Sports Padel Bag - Men's + Women's Paddle Tennis Padel Sling Bag Backpack - Adjustable Size Equipment Bag for Padel + Paddle Tennis - Gray
features: EQUIPMENT BAG: This Padel sling bag backpack effortlessly holds all your Padel gear, including up to (2) paddles, balls, a water bottle and any other accessories you may need
STORAGE POCKET: This sling bag backpack also comes with a large back pocket with additional storage inside for storing a change of dry clothes, towels, drinks and other supplies
VALUABLES POCKET: An additional fleece-lined pocket makes it easy to store your phone, keys, sunglasses and more safely while you play
FENCE HOOK: Made with a built-in fence hook to keep your bag off the ground for safekeeping
ADJUSTABLE: Designed with an adjustable shoulder strap makes this sling bag perfect for Padel players of all sizes to use comfortably
description: Don’t just settle for any ordinary backpack—get a Padel sling bag designed by Franklin Sports! This sling bag backpack is a great way to get all of your paddle tennis equipment to the courts with ease. Store up to (2) paddles in the front compartment and still have plenty of room for Padel balls, water bottles and other accessories in the main zipper pouch. With a fleece lined valuables pocket, you can also keep your phone, glasses, and keys protected while you play. Plus, this Padel backpack is made with an adjustable strap to fit paddle tennis players of all sizes. So don't hesitate, grab your bag and hit the Padel courts today!
